Public Member Functions
hal::DisplayDevice Class Reference

Documentation

This class is a display device. It inherits both Display and Dev so that a display found at, for example, "/dev/display0" can be drawn on.

Member Function Documentation

int hal::DisplayDevice::disable ( ) const
virtual

Turns the display off.

Implements hal::Display.

int hal::DisplayDevice::enable ( ) const
virtual

Turns the display on.

Implements hal::Display.

int hal::DisplayDevice::init ( const char *  name)
virtual

Initializes the display.

Implements hal::Display.

bool hal::DisplayDevice::is_busy ( ) const
virtual

Returns true if the display is actively copying the video buffer to the display

Returns
True if the LCD is busy

Reimplemented from sgfx::Bitmap.

void hal::DisplayDevice::refresh ( ) const
virtual

Refreshes the display.

This method will cause the driver to write the current video memory to the display.

Reimplemented from sgfx::Bitmap.

void hal::DisplayDevice::wait ( u16  resolution) const
virtual

Blocks until the display is not busy anymore.

Reimplemented from sgfx::Bitmap.
